Class SalesforceSDKManagerWithSmartStore

java.lang.Object

      com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartstore.app.SalesforceSDKManagerWithSmartStore
All Implemented Interfaces:
AccountWatcher.AccountRemoved
public class SalesforceSDKManagerWithSmartStore
extends SalesforceSDKManager

Super class for all force applications that use the smartstore.
